name: echo_get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool echo_api.
Tool description: Echo API that answer everything that you send back to you. Supports GET, POST, DELETE, PUT and PATCH.
API description: Make a HTTP GET request to the echo API with specified content type and code.

content_type.description: The content type to include in the request.

code.description: The response code you would like to get in the response. Defaults to '201'.
